title: Urja'23
description: This is an intra-institute. Spread over three days during February/ March, learners are encouraged to participate in this event at least in the form of a spectator. Athletes are always inspired by the presence of a team of supporters. Urja not only tests oneâ€™s physical abilities in track and field events but also offers an opportunity for creating a familial bond among different members of learners.
